page.title: 09Village Commerce.
page.content: Pubs: There used to be quite a number of pubs and ale and cider houses in the locality. "The Bannut Tree" (walnut tree) is now a private house as is the old "Carpenters' Arms". Two public houses remain, "The New Inn" and "The Volunteer". Garages/petrol...1 (there were two until recently). Home Tune..Travelling car service etc. Post Office and stores. Hairdresser (ladies'). Butcher. Riding School. Antique Clock Repairer. Mini-market and grocery. Cooperative Tomato Growers. Until recently there was a launderette and a D.I.Y. cum garden centre which has now been replaced by the Butcher's.
